alert.note: Alert for Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 12:36AM MST until November 09 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MST /5 AM PST/ THIS MORNING TO 1 PM MST /NOON PST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Parker Valley. In California, Palo Verde Valley and Chuckwalla Valley. * WHEN...From 6 AM MST /5 AM PST/ this morning to 1 PM MST /noon PST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
